name: Kicks'n'Relics
description:
Caution: If you unfocus the game by clicking elsewhere on the itch.io page, you might need to refresh the page to continue playing !

A Ludum Dare 48 Game

Blaze though old ruins in search of mythic ([citation needed]) artifacts in this old school beat 'em up. Face countless hordes of mummies and become rich by selling other people treasures, as you delve deeper and deeper into the unknown !

Controls :
  • S : Jump
  • D : Punch
  • F : Grab/Throw items
  • Arrow Keys : Move
Featuring :
  • One fully animated player monkey character
  • Mummies, lots of them
  • Punchy combat
  • Funky music !
  • Crazy artifacts
  • Bricks.
Credits :
  • Goomboo : Art (backgrounds), Programming
  • Eldraev : Art (animator)
  • Valden : Programming
  • Reblys : Music
